showDocumentation.title: Show documentation box
showDocumentation.description: Whether to show documentation box next to the completion suggestions.

continuousHinting.title: Continuous hinting
continuousHinting.description: Whether to enable continuous hinting (Hinterland mode).

suppressInvokeIn.title: Suppress invoke in specific code fragments
suppressInvokeIn.description: An array of CodeMirror tokens for which the auto-invoke should be suppressed. The token names vary between languages (modes).

theme.title: Completer theme
theme.description: The identifier of a completer theme with icons which indicate the kind of completion. Set to null to disable icons.
